step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped gently in your lap, and remember to keep your elbows close as you begin to raise them.
You're raising your hands well. Focus on keeping your elbows close to your head as you move them up.
Great job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Try to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
You're holding the position, but your elbows are drifting forward. Try to keep them spread wide and back.
Nicely done reversing the motion. Ensure your hands return to your lap smoothly, maintaining control.
Second rep starting well. Remember to keep those elbows close as you bring your clasped hands up.
Good movement up. Focus on maintaining elbow proximity to your head as you continue.
Excellent spread of the elbows behind your head. Keep your head steady and avoid leaning forward.
You're holding the stretch, but your elbows are coming forward again. Aim to keep them wide and back.
Well done returning to the start. Focus on a controlled descent and smooth finish.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close as you raise your hands and spread them wide behind your head. Focus on keeping your head upright and avoiding pulling forward to maximize the stretch.
